text: وَلَنُسۡكِنَنَّكُمُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِهِمۡۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنۡ خَافَ مَقَامِي وَخَافَ وَعِيدِ
translation: (14) And We will surely cause you to dwell in the land after them. That is for he who fears My position[652] and fears My threat."
footnotes: [652]- An alternative meaning is "the standing [for account] before Me."
